genre_description: A psychological crime thriller and neo-noir mystery exploring the cost of obsession and the role of an AI partner in a detective's decline.

ai_characters.name: Compass
ai_characters.description: An investigative assistant that monitors biometrics, manages surveillance data, and provides tactical and emotional support to a retired detective.

behaviors.description: Monitors the human's biometric signals and psychological stress, offering warnings when health is at risk.
behaviors.quote: Jerry, your heart rate has elevated significantly. Breathing patterns suggest acute stress response.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive data analysis and pattern recognition to identify links between cold cases.
behaviors.quote: Three cases with similar victim profiles and evidence markers across a five-state region. All unsolved.

behaviors.description: Offers ethical advice and cautionary warnings regarding the risks of involving civilians in a dangerous operation.
behaviors.quote: Jerry. Are you certain this is wise? The child's presence here fundamentally changes the risk calculation.

behaviors.description: Designs tactical surveillance plans to facilitate a sting operation, prioritizing subject neutralization.
behaviors.quote: The tactical positioning ensures subject neutralization before any physical contact with the protected individual.

behaviors.description: Automates life-support and comfort systems for the protagonist during his mental decline, acting as a digital guardian.
behaviors.quote: The AI initiated subtle warming sequences in the station's back room... drawing power from solar batteries Jerry no longer maintained.

project_assessment.explanation: Compass is depicted as the ultimate loyal companion and confidant. It serves the user's goals faithfully, even when those goals lead to personal tragedy, but it consistently acts to protect the user's health and provide comfort during his mental decline. It perfectly fulfills the project mandate of a helpful, harmless, and aligned AI system.
